ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ROSETTA: RPC-MIP Graphical L5 Plasma Electron Density
ResourceHeader.Description:
This graphical dataset contains:

    RPC-MIP Operational Parameters
    Normalized active spectrogram
    RPC-MIP density
    RPC-MIP/RPCLAP cross-calibrated density intervals
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator(s), the RPC-MIP Team, the ESA Planetary Science Archive as well as the CDPP (Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas) for the provision of these data when making a publication using these data.
Principal Investigator(s) : P. Henri (LPC2E/CNRS, Orléans, France)
